snippet: Afghan voters were divided over which candidate to support in Saturday's presidential runoff, but they broadly agreed on what they were looking for in their new leader after decades of war — security and jobs....

headline.print_headline: Afghan Voters Want Security, Jobs Above All
headline.main: Afghan Voters Want Security, Jobs Above All

lead_paragraph: Afghan voters were divided over which candidate to support in Saturday's presidential runoff, but they broadly agreed on what they were looking for in their new leader after decades of war — security and jobs.
